channel.title: 562 Help
channel.description:
I've just started editing a 562 to try and learn but one thing I cannot find out how to do for the life of me is:
[ul][li]Move NPC's/Objects.[/li] [li]Add/Subtract Items in shops aswell as change the prices of the items.[/li] [li]Edit drops.[/li] [li]Edit exp rates[/li][/ul]
EDIT: I think this is the wrong place. If so I'm sorry. :/
If anyone could just tell me WHERE to edit these files I think that would be enough (also what to look for ofc)
You can add me on MSN: coryallen440@yahoo.com

item.title: 562 Help
item.dc:creator: @coryallen1 coryallen1
item.description:
@coryallen1 wrote:

That was the kind of answer I was looking for. Thank you very much you helped tons. I would rep if I could.

Read full topic

item.title: 562 Help
item.dc:creator: @Nasz Nasz
item.description:
@Nasz wrote:

-> Moving NPC’s/Objects.

Your NPC’s can be found in

your source file>data>npcs.xml

There should already be some spawned NPC’s, but just incase…

494369134640

494 would be the NPC Id. (Banker - 494)
X is the X location. command “coords” can be useful for this
Y is the Y location. command “coords” also useful.
Z is the elevation. Since you will mostly be on the first floor, leave it 0. 1 is one floor up.

-> Adding/Subtracting Items In Shops

Change these in your source folder>src>com>rs2hd>content> Scroll down

Shops.java and ShopsHandler.java are the files you’ll be editing. It should be pretty basic, once you look through it.

-> Changing Prices

your source folder>data>prices.cfg “prices.cfg” is the folder you will edit, if the item isn’t there, just add it in anywhere, with the prices you wish for it.

-> Editing Drops

your source folder>data>npcDrops.cfg “npcDrops.cfg” is simple too edit…

npcid=itemid1,minamount to drop, max amount to drop, chance to drop: out of what chance;itemid, min amount.

So it’d be like this.

6260=11704,1-1,1:250;
6260 - NPC Id.
11704 - item
1-1 Minimum too Maximum ammounts too drop.
1:250 Chance of item too be dropped.

-> Exp. Rates

your source folder>src>com>rs2hd>model>Skills.java “Skills.java” is the file…

The Exp rates should be in there. <3 Hope I helped, I tried too make it as basic as I can lol.

Read full topic
